scenes.text:
Well hello there stranger...?
Did you just appear out of our fountain?....
Ahh, you must be the engineer I requested! We have come across a number of technical problems across the town, can you go try to fix them?
I have marked each task with a beacon in the sky, coloured based on difficulty!

Hi there, just back from getting my new set of resources and blocks from an ocean monument.
I have a variety of sea-based blocks too.
Including maps and even sand if you would like to smelt it for glass.

Hiya,
I sell plots of land for farming and animals for breeding.
I'm also happy to include the offer of 12 free chickens when a new plot of land is bought.

Swords, armour and enchanted books for sale.
Our latest line of horse armour is available too for the protection of your horses at all times.
We have a few iron swords on sale too if you are interested?

Hi there, i'm Smith! I'm your local blacksmith for weapons and armour.
We can repair items or we can enchant them with various effects from knockback on swords to unbreaking on chestplates.
Do you have any armour with you?
How did you even get up here!?
Not happening

Hey!
You look like the kind of person who'd be good at transporting items, I hear they need a hand at the dock with their newest haul of fish.
I think they should still be at the docks if you're interested in helping out.

Hi there!
I'm Nicola, I sell various minecarts, rails and spawners at a cheap price.
Would you be interested in our latest edition of hopper minecarts? They help automate the process of collecting items, then transporting them in carts.
Rock on
Rock, paper, scissors?

Hi there, haven't seen your face around here before? Nice to meet you!
I'm Homer, I help with the boats and the docking process for them coming into the pier.
Currently just signalling to the incoming boat to stop as we're still offloading.

Hello!
Are you new to Seymour island? Nice to meet you.
Have you seen the mine yet? It's recently been opened to the public and they let you mine out ores, from iron to even Diamond!
Haha, i'm on a "See"-food diet

Hiya,
I admire the work that goes on in the docks and seeing the fish being brought back to shore.
Have you checked out the town hall yet? I heard they had a few new tasks added recently. Why not take a look?
Ooooo, more fish have been brought in.

So this is what being a pirate gets you...
Shame Brady and I won't be able to record the next episode of HI...

*Beep* *Boop*
Giraffes don't exist.
*Beep* *Boop*
2/5

I promise,
it works

Welcome to Seymour Island Mine.
There are a series of tasks available for you to try.
Try one of the tasks on the left then make your way through the other 2 difficulty levels

Seymour Island gates are currently closed due to some technical issues.
You may not enter...
**HISSS** "Come in gate guard 1..."
"We have had reports of smoke coming up from the sewers, please investiate"
Sorry about that, I must go check this!
You're not mean't to be able to talk to me...%1%1What are you doing?%1%1Also, i'm not one of the five hidden robots, you'll need to look elsewhere for them

*Beep* *Boop*
Planes don't fly, they fall strategically
*Beep* *Boop*
4/5

*Beep* *Boop*
Birds aren't real
*Beep* *Boop*
1/5
